title: Are There Underground Cities?
description: In this episode, we answer a question from 5-year-old Wyatt in Los Angeles and learn about ancient underground cities in Turkey, the subterranean passageways of Montreal and the dug-out houses of Coober Pedy, Australia. Also in this episode: Why is it so warm underground?
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, we answer a question from 5-year-old Wyatt in Los Angeles and learn about ancient underground cities in Turkey.
author: questions@butwhykids.org (Vermont Public)
itunes:author: Vermont Public Radio
